name: Wesley Hinkle
summary: Software Developer with 25 years experience in designing and developing scalable, efficient, and secure software applications. Bottom-up systems thinker. Capable of working with a range of programming languages with expertise in OOP, RESTful APIs, and data modeling. Skilled in using tools for version control and collaboration. Strong understanding of software design principles, including SOLID principles, design patterns, and UML. Experienced with relational databases, including MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server. Very proficient in SQL, as well as shell scripts.
